1254850.name: Gods of Love Strategy Guide
1254850.description:
This brief strategy guide will tell you all the right choices to make to every single ending in the game and all the Achievements.

Once you purchase and install/download the Strategy Guide in the DLC list of Gods of Love in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Gods of Love) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the Strategy Guide in this folder.
